column1: Baby Barnaby's////My corned beef and hash...did I tell you about the waffle yet? Anyway
column2: I wasn't feeling the corned beef and hash. Though I applaud the size of the dish (huge)
column3: the corned beef was super dry
column4: and there was an overabundance of skillet potatoes in the dish. Though the scrambled eggs atop the dish offset the corned beef and potato tasted
column5: it wasn't enough to deem my dish the loser of the two dishes that morning (and
column7: I'm the guy at the table who always wants to have been the winner at ordering dishes).
